title: Looking for a Partner
body:
Hi guys, Aceblade here: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=aceblade

I've only started playing League around November last year and really love this game. I'm currently looking for someone who is not so serious about their rank but loves to win at the same time has fun and enjoys the concept of this game :)

I really love to play Shen + Morgana in all 3 ranked modes and currently on an 18 win streak. I've come to realize its not as fun when I'm playing alone so I'm interested in starting some DuoQ ^-^

replies.body: Not sure if you want to duo with me, im gold 5 and i care about my rank, i want to progress through the ranks. If you want the same thing, add me. Haidos :)
